info.title: Woop to retailer
info.description: This document contains the technical information about Woop APIs for carriers. For any questions or clarification, please contact the internal technical team.To use "Woop to Retailer" APIs, you must use the confidential access codes provided when you created your retailer account on the platform.The version currently available in the documentation is Version 1.7.0

put.description: This method allows you to receive the name of the selected carrier for a given order.The information is sent when the carrier to deliver the order is chosen.

requestBody.description: Contains the information of the selected carrier.

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

put.summary: Receive the selected carrier name for an order

put.description: This method allows the retailer to receive orders status. The retailer can then follow the progress of his order in real time.

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

put.description: This method allows the retailer to receive delivery status updates from the carrier for a given order.The retailer can then follow the progress of the delivery in real time.
This method allows the retailer to receive booking status.

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

put.description: This method allows the retailer to receive booking pinCode

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

put.description: This method allows the retailer to receive package status updates from the carrier during the delivery of a given sales order. The retailer can then track the progress of the delivery in real time on an individual parcel-by-parcel basis.

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

put.description: This method allows the retailer to receive status information on the Click & Collect order. The retailer can then monitor progress of the customer collection in real time .
This method allows you to receive customer comments following delivery.

comment.question: Do you have any suggestions to share with us to help us improve our delivery service?

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

value.message: Store doesn't exist or is inactive

put.summary: Receive delivery stops for an order

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

put.description: This method allows you to receive the stops set to a given order.The information is sent when the planning of the order is done.

requestBody.description: Contains the information of the routes linked to an order.

put.summary: Receive tracking Page Url for an order

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

put.description: This method allows you to receive the tracking set to a given order.The information is sent when the carrier is sending it to Woop.

requestBody.description: Contains the the tracking page url.

post.description: This method is used to receive billing information for a given delivery.

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

post.summary: Receive billing information for a delivery

post.description: This method is used to receive events related to an order. All notifications sent to the customer will be forwarded to the retailer: Failure reasons, sent date and content of the notification.

status.description: Indicates whether the event was correctly sent to the customer

failReason.description: Reason for failure if status is false

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

403.description: Information can no longer be sent

post.description: This method allows you to receive the deltaCost information issued by the carrier for the order during delivery. This data can be of type; Additional costs and/or discount for the delivery.

comment.description: Additional comment left by the carrier.

post.summary: Receive all quotes for an order

400.description: Missing and/or incorrect items in the body

post.description: This method allows you to receive all quotes issued to carriers for the creation of a delivery. Quotes will be returned to the retailer for information purposes.

score.title: Delivery rating (score)
score.description: Specifies the rating for the delivery given by the end customer and if it is included in the calculation of the carrier rating.

length.title: Dimension (length)
length.description: Specifies the size of a package.

mass.title: Weight (mass)
mass.description: Specifies the weight of a package/product.

lengthUnit.description: Specifies the unit of measurement for the dimensions.
lengthUnit.title: Unit of measurement (lengthUnit)

vehicleType.title: Type of carrier vehicle (vehicleType)
vehicleType.description: Specifies the type of vehicle used for the delivery.

additionalData.title: Additional data (additionalData)
additionalData.description: Allows you to receive personalised information/data from the carrier.

appointment.description: Specifies a range of dates and times for customer appointments.
appointment.title: Appointment date (appointment)

specifications.description: List of specifications recorded for a carrier on an order.
specifications.title: Specifications (specifications)

updateOrder.description: Indicates whether the order update is allowed

cancelOrder.description: Indicates whether the order cancellation is allowed

carrierLabel.description: Indicates whether the carrier has a carrier label

storageCapacity.description: Indicates whether the carrier has storage capacity

distance.description: Specifies the distance between two points.
distance.title: Distance (distance)

distanceUnit.title: Unit of distance (distanceUnit)
distanceUnit.description: Specifies the unit of measurement for the distance calculation.

deltaCostReason.title: Reason for deltaCost (deltaCostReason)
deltaCostReason.description: Specifies the reason reported by the carrier for creating a deltaCost on an order.

getQuote.description: All quotes issued by the carriers when requesting the creation of an order.
getQuote.title: Information on the carrier quotes (getQuote)

quoteId.description: For a refused quote the value is equal to "-1"

refusedReason.title: Reason for refusal (refusedReason)
refusedReason.description: Specifies the possible reasons for refusal of a quote.

Example.question: Do you have any suggestions to share with us to help us improve our delivery service?

putBookingLoadingIdentifications.title: putBookingLoadingIdentifications
putBookingLoadingIdentifications.description: send the booking pinCode to the retailer

properties.description:
loading identification if is a classical order
unloading identification if is a return order

putBookingStatus.title: putBookingStatus
putBookingStatus.description: send the booking status to the retailer
